participant_1.name: James
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, James is always looking for opportunities to grow and succeed in his career. He's confident and enjoys engaging in meaningful conversations.
participant_1.background: i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i grew up in manhattan. i drive a bmw. my parents are very wealthy bankers.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and sociable, Emily loves meeting new people and sharing experiences. She's determined and has a clear vision for her future.
participant_2.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. i plan to go to business school next year.
